item.title: Convert all FLAC music collection to Apple Lossless (ALAC)
item.description: It preserve the metadata by itself. To do every flac in a directory: for f in ./*.flac; do ffmpeg -i "$f" -c:v copy -c:a alac "${f%.*}.m4a"; done mkdir ALAC mv *.m4a ALAC
